channel.title: Reinforcement-Learning on My portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement-Learning on My portfolio

item.title: Rocket Landing using Reinforcement Learning!
item.description: “A crash is just a high-speed landing… in the wrong place.” – Unknown RL Agent 🚀 Landing Rockets and Losing Our Minds: A Reinforcement Learning Journey By Harshavardhan Manohar & Nivedita Shainaj Nair 🧠 Prologue: It Started With a Rocket We wanted to land a rocket. Not in real life, of course, that would’ve been wildly over budget for two grad students, but in a 2D simulation. Our project was supposed to be a “standard” application of reinforcement learning, something nice and contained.
